definition: enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand
hostile/malevolence/antagonism/to view as enemy/to stand against
to be equal to/to be well-matched/rival

sentences.english: BMW still trails Audi as the top luxury car brand in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，寶馬依然不敵奧迪頭號豪華車品牌的地位。

sentences.english: Promises may get thee friends, but nonperformance will turn them into enemies.
sentences.chinese: 許諾會爲你贏得朋友，但是食言則會化友爲敵。

sentences.english: The gas is does, endure is the enemy, but to leave the bitterest curse of ground, children in crops.
sentences.chinese: 氣是無明火，忍是敵災星，但留方寸地，把於子孫耕。

sentences.english: The enemy aircraft plunged down in flames before the pilot had time to bail out.
sentences.chinese: 敵飛行員還沒來得及跳傘，飛機就冒着火栽下來了。

sentences.english: They planned to take out the enemy arsenal by bombing it.
sentences.chinese: 他們計劃炸燬敵兵工廠。

sentences.english: Let's anticipate the enemy's move and occupy that city.
sentences.chinese: 我們要制敵先機搶先攻佔那個城市。

sentences.english: THE Bible designates two things which are at absolute enmity with God.
sentences.chinese: 聖經指明瞭兩件完全與上帝爲敵的事。

sentences.english: General Yanbei detachment of the Japanese army first ambush Guang-wu, avoid enemy more than 500 people.
sentences.chinese: 將軍之雁北支隊首戰伏擊廣武日軍，毖敵500餘人。

sentences.english: Then, the Song court was forced to move to Hangzhou as its imperial court because it could not push back the nomadic invaders.
sentences.chinese: 那時南宋朝廷不敵遊牧民族的進攻，被迫轉移到杭州。

sentences.english: A man in vicious company is among his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 一個人在壞的羣體，就如與敵爲友。

sentences.english: It has demagogued, turning Russians against the West.
sentences.chinese: 它大搞煽動，讓俄羅斯人與西方爲敵。

sentences.english: The existence of other alternate foods in citrus orchards is of benefit to the predacious mites.
sentences.chinese: 柑桔園中存在其它補充食物時對這兩種捕食敵有利。

sentences.english: 10but they could not stand up against his wisdom or the Spirit by whom he spoke.
sentences.chinese: 司提反是以智慧和聖靈說話，衆人敵擋不住。

sentences.english: This is the number one environmental cause of skin aging.
sentences.chinese: 這是自然環境作用於肌膚老化的第一天敵。

sentences.english: God indicates that many antichrists exist to harm people's souls.
sentences.chinese: 神指出很多敵基督存在，要傷害人們的靈魂。
這是場勢均力力敵的比賽。

definition: to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
